short.ar: اعثر على عنوان البريد الإلكتروني في ثوانٍ - مكتشف بريد إلكتروني مجاني لـ LinkedIn. البحث في رسائل البريد الإلكتروني من وراء أي موقع.
short.am: በኢሜል አድራሻ በሰከንዶች ውስጥ ያግኙ - ለLinkedIn ነፃ ኢሜል ፈላጊ። ከማንኛውም ድር ጣቢያ ጀርባ ኢሜይሎችን ይፈልጉ እና B2B መሪዎችን ያግኙ።
short.bg: Намерете имейл адрес за секунди – безплатен търсач на имейли за LinkedIn. Търсете имейли зад всеки уебсайт.
short.bn: সেকেন্ডের মধ্যে ইমেল ঠিকানা খুঁজুন - LinkedIn-এর জন্য বিনামূল্যে ইমেল সন্ধানকারী। যেকোনো ওয়েবসাইটের পিছনে ইমেল অনুসন্ধান করুন।
short.ca: Trobeu l'adreça de correu electrònic en qüestió de segons: cercador de correu electrònic gratuït per a LinkedIn.
short.cs: Najděte e-mailovou adresu během několika sekund – bezplatný vyhledávač e-mailů pro LinkedIn.
short.da: Find e-mailadresse på få sekunder – gratis e-mail-finder til LinkedIn. Søg e-mails bag enhver hjemmeside og få B2B-leads.
short.de: E-Mail-Adresse in Sekundenschnelle finden – kostenloser E-Mail-Finder für LinkedIn. Durchsuchen Sie E-Mails hinter jeder Website.
short.el: Βρείτε τη διεύθυνση email σε δευτερόλεπτα – δωρεάν εργαλείο εύρεσης email για το LinkedIn.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: LinkedIn Email Finder – Look up emails for free. Find email address in seconds – free email finder. Search emails on website.
short.es,es_419: Encuentre la dirección de correo electrónico en segundos: buscador de correo electrónico gratuito para LinkedIn.
short.et: Leidke e-posti aadress sekunditega – LinkedIni jaoks tasuta meiliotsija. Otsige e-kirju mis tahes veebisaidi tagant.
short.fa: آدرس ایمیل را در چند ثانیه بیابید – ایمیل یاب رایگان برای لینکدین. ایمیل های پشت هر وب سایتی را جستجو کنید.
short.fi: Löydä sähköpostiosoite sekunneissa – ilmainen sähköpostihaku LinkedInille. Etsi sähköposteja minkä tahansa verkkosivuston takaa.
short.fil: Maghanap ng email address sa ilang segundo – libreng email finder para sa LinkedIn.
short.fr: Trouvez une adresse e-mail en quelques secondes - outil de recherche d'e-mails gratuit pour LinkedIn.
short.gu: સેકન્ડમાં ઇમેઇલ સરનામું શોધો - LinkedIn માટે મફત ઇમેઇલ શોધક. કોઈપણ વેબસાઈટ પાછળ ઈમેઈલ શોધો અને B2B લીડ્સ મેળવો.
short.he: מצא כתובת אימייל בשניות - מאתר אימייל בחינם עבור LinkedIn. חפש אימיילים מאחורי כל אתר וקבל לידים B2B.
short.hi: सेकंड में ईमेल पता खोजें - लिंक्डइन के लिए मुफ्त ईमेल खोजक। किसी भी वेबसाइट के पीछे ईमेल खोजें और B2B लीड प्राप्त करें।
short.hr: Pronađite adresu e-pošte za nekoliko sekundi – besplatni alat za traženje e-pošte za LinkedIn.
short.hu: E-mail cím keresése másodpercek alatt – ingyenes e-mail kereső a LinkedIn számára. Keressen e-maileket bármely webhely mögött.
short.id: Temukan alamat email dalam hitungan detik – pencari email gratis untuk LinkedIn. Cari email di balik situs web apa pun.
short.it: Trova l'indirizzo e-mail in pochi secondi: trova e-mail gratis per LinkedIn. Cerca le email da qualsiasi sito web.
short.ja: 数秒でメールアドレスを見つける–LinkedIn用の無料のメールファインダー。 Webサイトの背後にある電子メールを検索して、B2Bリードを取得します。
short.kn: ಸೆಕೆಂಡುಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಇಮೇಲ್ ವಿಳಾಸವನ್ನು ಹುಡುಕಿ - ಲಿಂಕ್ಡ್‌ಇನ್‌ಗಾಗಿ ಉಚಿತ ಇಮೇಲ್ ಫೈಂಡರ್. ಯಾವುದೇ ವೆಬ್‌ಸೈಟ್‌ನ ಹಿಂದೆ ಇಮೇಲ್‌ಗಳನ್ನು ಹುಡುಕಿ.
short.ko: 몇 초 만에 이메일 주소 찾기 – LinkedIn용 무료 이메일 찾기. 웹사이트 뒤에서 이메일을 검색하고 B2B 리드를 얻으세요.
short.lt: Raskite el. pašto adresą per kelias sekundes – nemokama „LinkedIn“ el. pašto paieška. Ieškokite el. laiškų už bet kurios svetainės.
short.lv,ml: Atrodiet e-pasta adresi dažu sekunžu laikā — bezmaksas e-pasta meklētājs pakalpojumam LinkedIn. Meklējiet e-pastus jebkurā vietnē.
short.mr: काही सेकंदात ईमेल पत्ता शोधा – LinkedIn साठी मोफत ईमेल शोधक. कोणत्याही वेबसाइटवर ईमेल शोधा आणि B2B लीड मिळवा.
short.ms: Cari alamat e-mel dalam beberapa saat – pencari e-mel percuma untuk LinkedIn. Cari e-mel di mana-mana tapak web.
short.nl: Vind e-mailadres in seconden - gratis e-mailzoeker voor LinkedIn. Zoek in e-mails op elke website en ontvang B2B-leads.
short.no: Finn e-postadresse på sekunder – gratis e-postfinner for LinkedIn. Søk i e-poster på hvilken som helst nettside og få B2B-kundeemner
short.pl: Znajdź adres e-mail w kilka sekund – bezpłatna wyszukiwarka wiadomości e-mail na LinkedIn. Przeszukuj e-maile w dowolnej witrynie.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Encontre emails em segundos — localizador de email grátis para LinkedIn. Busca emails atrás de qualquer site e obter leads B2B.
short.ro: Găsiți adresa de e-mail în câteva secunde – căutare de e-mail gratuită pentru LinkedIn. Căutați e-mailuri pe orice site web.
short.ru: Найдите адрес электронной почты за секунду - бесплатный поиск почты для LinkedIn. Поиск электронных ящиков на любом веб-сайте.
short.sk: Nájdite e-mailovú adresu za pár sekúnd – bezplatný vyhľadávač e-mailov pre LinkedIn.
short.sl: Poiščite e-poštni naslov v nekaj sekundah – brezplačen iskalnik e-pošte za LinkedIn. Poiščite e-pošto na katerem koli spletnem mestu
short.sr: Пронађите адресу е-поште за неколико секунди – бесплатан претраживач е-поште за LinkedIn.
short.sv: Hitta e-postadresser på några sekunder – gratis e-postsökare för LinkedIn. Sök e-postmeddelanden på vilken webbplats som helst.
short.sw: Pata anwani ya barua pepe kwa sekunde - kitafuta barua pepe bila malipo cha LinkedIn. Tafuta barua pepe kwenye tovuti yoyote.
short.ta: நொடிகளில் மின்னஞ்சல் முகவரியைக் கண்டறியவும் - LinkedInக்கான இலவச மின்னஞ்சல் கண்டுபிடிப்பான்.
short.te: సెకన్లలో ఇమెయిల్ చిరునామాను కనుగొనండి - లింక్డ్ఇన్ కోసం ఉచిత ఇమెయిల్ ఫైండర్. ఏదైనా వెబ్‌సైట్‌లో ఇమెయిల్‌లను శోధించండి.
short.th: ค้นหาที่อยู่อีเมลในไม่กี่วินาที – ค้นหาอีเมลฟรีสำหรับ LinkedIn ค้นหาอีเมลในเว็บไซต์และรับโอกาสในการขายแบบ B2B
short.tr: E-posta adresini saniyeler içinde bulun – LinkedIn için ücretsiz e-posta bulucu. Herhangi bir web sitesinde e-postaları arayın.
short.uk: Знаходь електронну адресу за секунду - безкоштовний пошук пошти для LinkedIn. Пошук електронних скриньок на будь-якому веб-сайті.
short.vi: Tìm địa chỉ email trong vài giây - công cụ tìm email miễn phí cho LinkedIn. Tìm kiếm email trên bất kỳ trang web nào.
short.zh_CN: 在几秒钟内找到电子邮件地址 - LinkedIn 的免费电子邮件查找器。 在任何网站上搜索电子邮件并获得 B2B 潜在客户。
short.zh_TW: 在幾秒鐘內找到電子郵件地址 - LinkedIn 的免費電子郵件查找器。 在任何網站上搜索電子郵件並獲得 B2B 潛在客戶。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extract emails with GetProspect. Our plugin is the fast and easy-to-use LinkedIn email finder tool that helps to get accurate business email addresses in seconds. 
 
✔ Email Finder
 
It is the best solution to find email addresses of your connections for free or any people from LinkedIn search. With GetProspect Chrome extension you can easily find anyone’s email address and generate LinkedIn leads by clicking just one button in users’ profiles.
 
- Easily search for email addresses of your 1st, 2nd and 3rd+ Linkedin connections;
- Find business email addresses of any person from the basic LinkedIn or Sales Navigator search based on your specific search filters;
- Save leads with emails in bulk from Sales Navigator lead lists or LinkedIn group members;
- Get all the obtained email addresses verified for FREE. 
 
✔ Bulk email finder
 
Save hundreds or thousands of contacts at once with our batch email finder by clicking «Select all» → «Save prospects» in LinkedIn search, LinkedIn group members, or LinkedIn events attendees. Add the number of pages you want to save leads from. Our bulk email tool will automatically find and add their verified emails to your list. 
 
✔ Email finder by name and by domain 
 
You can generate LinkedIn leads from basic search or with Sales Navigator. You just fill in your search criteria on LinkedIn, then extract hundreds of potential clients into a spreadsheet. 
You not only get an email address – but also other data from LinkedIn:
 
- first and last name
- position
- location
- summary
- company name
- industry
- company website and address
- LinkedIn profile URL
 
✔ Find email address by name with GetProspect email extractor extension
 
This is how to search email by name in 2 minutes. To look up email addresses by name you enter the first and last names of the person of interest in a LinkedIn search. Go to their profile and click «Get email». The email and other information about the prospect will be saved to your GetProspect account. 
 
✔ CRM contact management software
 
All your saved leads from LinkedIn you will find in GetProspect contact management software. The web-based CRM allows you to:
 
- group your leads in relevant folders; 
- segment your prospects with dynamic lists; 
- create custom filters; 
- cooperate with team members; 
- export your lists in the necessary format;
- integrate GetProspect with Gmail or other sales tools. 
 
✔ Our email finder is ideal for: 
 
- Sales teams
- Founders and owners
- Freelancers
- Consultants 
- Project managers
- Digital marketers
- Email marketers
- Growth marketers
- Recruiters
- Outbound marketers
 
✔ Main advantages GetProspect email extractor:
 
- FREE monthly credits
- Online human support
- Email verification at no additional cost
- Compatible with free LinkedIn, Sales Navigator and Recruiter
- Pricing beginning with 49$/month
- Exporting LinkedIn leads with the data in .csv or .xlsx
- Saving numerous LinkedIn pages at once
- Integrations with other services
 
✔ How to use the email address finder plugin?
 
Step 1. Install the GetProspect email extractor Chrome extension. 
Step 2. Go to any LinkedIn profile and click on the «Get email» button. You will see the GetProspect banner indicating that the email is found and saved.
Step 3. Or make a search on basic LinkedIn or Sales Navigator, click «Select all» → «Save prospects» and get multiple pages of leads with emails. 
  
✔ FAQ

1. Can I use GetProspect email finder extension for free?

Yes, email extractor plugin is free, but you can use it only in the Google Chrome browser for now.
 
2. How to find email addresses on LinkedIn?
 
To find email with the GetProspect extension, open any LinkedIn profile and tap on the «Get email» button. The email will be automatically saved. If you want to save many emails, open the list of LinkedIn profiles in LinkedIn search, LinkedIn group, or LinkedIn events and click «Select all» → «Save prospects.»
 
3. Can I find email address owner with GetProspect?
 
You can find email addresses owners in your GetProspect account with the enrichment feature. Go to the «Enrich» page, choose «Email lookup section», and enter the email of interest.  
 
4. How can I use email extractor software for business?

You can use the GetProspect extension to find emails of potential clients to reach them without reputation risks to your email account.
 
5. Can I extract emails from websites by GetProspect?

Yes. Go to the tab with the website and click on the GetProspect icon among your extensions. You will see the panel and field to enter the name you want to find the email for. 
 
6. Which payment methods can I use for GetProspect subscription?

You can pay for the GetProspect subscription through the Fondy payment gate or BlueSnap payment gate. By default, our system offers to pay through Fondy. In case you are unable to pay by this method, try to use BlueSnap.
 
7. How to cancel my email finder subscription?

Go to the Settings icon in your GetPropsect account. Choose the Price and billing section. In the Subscription tab, find your plan and click Cancel subscription.
 
 
For any further questions about email finder, feel free to contact us support@getprospect.com
